snippet.title: The Light Brigade (VR) - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Ascend the ranks of The Light Brigade as you journey through shattered memories to return light to the darkness in this tactical roguelike VR shooter.

Arriving on Meta Quest 2, PSVR, PSVR2 and SteamVR in Q1 2023.

🎇 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1579880/The_Light_Brigade/
🎇 Wishlist/Pre-Order on PS5 (PSVR2): https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005085/
🎇 Wishlist/Pre-Order on PS4 (PSVR2): https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005085/

Home: https://www.lightbrigadevr.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/funktroniclabs
Press Inquiries: press@funktroniclabs.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/funktroniclabs

#psvr2 #metaquest2 #steamvr #thelightbrigade #oculusquest2 #roguelike #shooter #vr #quest #playstation #gaming
